title: Radiant Baseboard Heat, No Security Deposit Required, Air Conditioned
posting_body: ['Huntington House’s plush, landscaped courtyards with two community pools, walking paths, sundecks, barbecues and picnic tables welcomes residents with the perfect environment to call “home”.', 'Each apartment offers spacious floor plans, beautiful views of the courtyards and private entry.', 'Located on Fort Street enjoy Huntington House’s neighborhood charm in the city.', 'We would love for you to come on by and see what Huntington House has to offer!', '-Online Payment Options (Credit Card, Debit Card and ACH)', '-Laundry Facility', '-One $35 Application Fee Per Apartment, Not Per Person', '-Package Acceptance', '-BBQ & Picnic Area', '-Sparkling Clean Swimming Pool', '-Upgraded Units Available', '-Air Conditioned', '-Radiant Baseboard Heat', '-Private Entrance', '-Picture Windows with Courtyard Views', '-Late Fee Forgiveness', 'Call:', 'show contact info', 'For more information, visit us at: <URL>', 'Pricing and availability is subject to change.']
